Lists values that specify the cursor mode for the PDF control.
Sets the cursor mode to hand tool.
Sets the cursor mode to marquee zoom tool.
Sets the cursor mode to select tool.
Lists values that specify the command bar style for the PDF Viewer control.
Command bar is disabled.
Lists values that specify the zoom mode of the PDF document.
Sets the document zoom factor to 1 to display a page in actual size .
Sets the custom document zoom factor according to the property value.
The document zoom factor is calculated to fit the actual content of a page (if possible).
Sets the largest zoom level that will allow the document page to be displayed without a horizontal scroll bar appearing.
Sets the zoom level so that one page fills the document pane vertically.
